verses.text: Then Solomon began to build the house of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* at Jerusalem in mount Moriah , where \add the \+nd Lord\+nd*\add* appeared unto David his father , in the place that David had prepared in the threshingfloor of Ornan the Jebusite.\f + \fr 3.1 \ft where…: or, which was seen of David his father\f*\f + \fr 3.1 \ft Ornan: also called, Araunah\f*
And he began to build in the second \add day\add* of the second month , in the fourth year of his reign. \p

¶ Now these \add are the things wherein\add* Solomon was instructed for the building of the house of God. The length by cubits after the first measure \add was\add* threescore cubits , and the breadth twenty cubits.\f + \fr 3.3 \ft instructed: Heb. founded\f*

And the porch that \add was\add* in the front \add of the house\add*, the length \add of it was\add* according to the breadth of the house , twenty cubits , and the height \add was\add* an hundred and twenty : and he overlaid it within with pure gold.
And the greater house he cieled with fir tree , which he overlaid with fine gold , and set thereon palm trees and chains.
And he garnished the house with precious stones for beauty : and the gold \add was\add* gold of Parvaim.\f + \fr 3.6 \ft garnished: Heb. covered\f*
He overlaid also the house , the beams , the posts , and the walls thereof, and the doors thereof, with gold ; and graved cherubims on the walls.

And he made the most holy house , the length whereof \add was\add* according to the breadth of the house , twenty cubits , and the breadth thereof twenty cubits : and he overlaid it with fine gold , \add amounting\add* to six hundred talents.
And the weight of the nails \add was\add* fifty shekels of gold. And he overlaid the upper chambers with gold. \p
And in the most holy house he made two cherubims of image work , and overlaid them with gold.\f + \fr 3.10 \ft image…: or, (as some think) of moveable work\f* \p

¶ And the wings of the cherubims \add were\add* twenty cubits long : one wing \add of the one cherub was\add* five cubits , reaching to the wall of the house : and the other wing \add was likewise\add* five cubits , reaching to the wing of the other cherub.

And \add one\add* wing of the other cherub \add was\add* five cubits , reaching to the wall of the house : and the other wing \add was\add* five cubits \add also\add*, joining to the wing of the other cherub.
The wings of these cherubims spread themselves forth twenty cubits : and they stood on their feet , and their faces \add were\add* inward.\f + \fr 3.13 \ft inward: or, toward the house\f* \p
¶ And he made the vail \add of\add* blue , and purple , and crimson , and fine linen , and wrought cherubims thereon.\f + \fr 3.14 \ft wrought: Heb. caused to ascend\f*

Also he made before the house two pillars of thirty and five cubits high , and the chapiter that \add was\add* on the top of each of them \add was\add* five cubits.\f + \fr 3.15 \ft high: Heb. long\f*
And he made chains , \add as\add* in the oracle , and put \add them\add* on the heads of the pillars ; and made an hundred pomegranates , and put \add them\add* on the chains.

And he reared up the pillars before the temple , one on the right hand , and the other on the left ; and called the name of that on the right hand Jachin , and the name of that on the left Boaz.\f + \fr 3.17 \ft Jachin: that is, He shall establish\f*\f + \fr 3.17 \ft Boaz: that is, In it is strength\f*
